text: Adherbal (, ) may refer to: *Adherbal (admiral), Carthaginian admiral during the First Punic War *Adherbal (governor), governor of Gades during the Second Punic War *Adherbal (king of Numidia), reigned 118 to 112 BC *Adherbal roy de Numidie, a 17th-century play by French dramatist François Joseph Lagrange- Chancel
title: Adherbal
